title: Chat Banned for this?
body:
Funny thing is, one of those games was over a few weeks ago. So this system is complete shit. I reported a guy for saying Ky$ to me multiple times. U know that he was still playing after i submitted screen shots too. I think im done with Leagues and their babies they coddle.

Rebel 986: LOOL}
Rebel 986: this is why i usually jg
Rebel 986: ggwp

replies.body: I muted my WHOLE Team on last 2 games and was talkin with other team
I'm not sure what exactly you are trying to say with that. You are aware the mute only stops *you* from seeing the chat, not other people from seeing yours?

> [{quoted}](name=The Wolf King,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rOoEAcEN,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-02-24T00:30:15.057+0000)
>
> I'm not sure what exactly you are trying to say with that. You are aware the mute only stops *you* from seeing the chat, not other people from seeing yours?

Ur telling me that i deserve a chat ban?  YET i have reported and screen shot someone saying KYS and NOTHING HAPPENS? this is what im talking bout. AND I KNOW because I kept track of the guy and NOTHING HAPPENED. im sick and tired of this game and how they BABY the kids. FUCK THIS GAME!

> [{quoted}](name=Rebel 986,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rOoEAcEN,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-02-24T00:43:57.807+0000)
>
> Ur telling me that i deserve a chat ban?  YET i have reported and screen shot someone saying KYS and NOTHING HAPPENS? this is what im talking bout. AND I KNOW because I kept track of the guy and NOTHING HAPPENED. im sick and tired of this game and how they BABY the kids. FUCK THIS GAME!

That person likely got a 14 day ban. You got a chat ban for being generally negative and annoying over a long period of time.
You're saying you don't deserve punishment because someone else did worse?

> [{quoted}](name=riplol87,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rOoEAcEN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-24T00:23:08.637+0000)
>
>

I want to know what you did to get permbanned with one game. That must have been pretty spectacularly dumb. Nobody goes through here with a perm without hitting the 14 day ban first.

Or occam's razor, you are just lying.

Chat banned for that.

I have seen smarter shit from a 7 year old having a tantrum in CoD single player, it made my eyeballs try to rotate backwards and escape.
